Package org.everit.osgi.dev.maven.util

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BundleExecutionPlan
    Creates a bundle execution plan on the OSGi container based on the old and new settings and the content of the bundle files.
    BundleExecutionPlan.TemporaryBundleMaps
    Temporary data used for calculation.
    DaemonStreamRedirector
    Redirects the input of an InputStream to one or more output streams.
    DistributableArtifact
    An artifact that can be copied to the distributed environment.
    DistUtil
    Utility methods for distribution mojo.
    EnvironmentCleaner
    Cleans the folder of an environment from unwanted files after an incremental upgrade.
    EOsgiConstants
    Constants for eosgi.
    FileManager
    This class is not thread-safe.
    PluginUtil
    Util functions for every plugin in this library.
    PredefinedRepoArtifactResolver
    Resolves maven artifacts from repositories.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    DuplicateArtifactException
    Exception showing that an artifact is twice in the dependency list.
